newsitem.title: USA: Holly unit settles with TommyKnocker.
newsitem.headline: Holly unit settles with TommyKnocker.

text.p: Holly Products Inc said on Friday its Country World Casinos Inc unit settled with Tommyknocker Casino Corp/New Allied Development Corp in accordance with the bankruptcy court order of November 5.
Holly said it estimated Country World saved about $700,000 in the ruling put forth by the court.

In early November, Holly Products said a U.S. Bankruptcy Court ruled on an ongoing dispute between Country World Casino and TommyKnocker about, among other things, payments due for land Country World bought from TommyKnocker/New Allied.
But the judge had left it open to both parties to agree on a final settlement amount. Holly Products declined to dislose this amount.

William Patrowicz, Holly Products president, said: "It is of great comfort to have this milestone behind us. We will now diligently work with the remaining unsecured creditors in accordance with the court's May 1996 order, to resolve and pay everyone in the shortest possible time frame."
